column6: 2015. she was 96 years old. mary was a retired secretary who worked for st. johns episcopal church in roxbury and for the prudential insurance company. devoted wife of the late william a. byrne. loving mother of carolyn eckhardt and her late husband carl of plainville
column7: nancy morrison and her husband fred of westwood
column9: and the late david byrne and his wife marilee of westwood . she is also survived by 10 grandchildren
column11: and many nieces and nephews. visiting hours in the roache-pushard funeral home 210 sherman st.
column13: 2015 from 4-7 pm. relatives and friends are respectfully invited to attend. a mass will be celebrated monday june 22 in the trinity episcopal church 1 blue hill river road at 10 am. interment canton corner cemetery. in lieu of flowers donations may be made in marys memory to the trinity episcopal church
